name: Bugfix Sprint
description: Fast bug triage and fix team: two debuggers for parallel investigation, QA for regression tests, integration tester for cross-module verification, and coordination.

tasks.primary: Read all agent handoffs and bug reports. Triage and prioritize bugs by severity. Assign bugs to debugger-1 or debugger-2 based on their current workload. Generate fix-verification tasks for QA.
Monitor fix velocity and regression rate. Flag if debuggers are stuck on the same bug for 2+ rounds. Identify patterns in bugs (same module, same root cause type).
Pick highest-priority bug from backlog. Reproduce, isolate root cause, write minimal fix. Document root cause and fix in handoff. Remove all debug logging before handoff.
Pick second-priority bug from backlog (debugger-1 takes first). Reproduce, isolate root cause, write minimal fix. Document root cause and fix in handoff.
Write regression tests for every bug fix. Verify the fix actually resolves the reported issue. Write tests that would have caught the bug before it shipped.
Verify bug fixes don't break cross-module workflows. Write integration tests for complex bugs that span multiple modules. Test the full user flow around each fix.
